title: The Game
description: What would you do for one million dollars? Or rather, what wouldnâ€™t you do? Would you play a game?One contract. Two Guys. Three players. Four Strikes. Five rules. Six zeros. Seven days.No safe words. No questions. Complete submission. Are you game?This is a VERY dark book and has many, many triggers--all of which lend to the story. Trigger include but are not limited Dubious consent, emotional and psychological abuse, drug addiction, suicide, mental health issues, rape, and murder.Reader discretion is advised.**The Game was originally released in 2017 as seven short novellas. It was removed from sale in 2021. This is a newly edited edition with new content.
author: L.P. Lovell
